name: Chess game 2 players
description:
Playing chess on a round board for 2 players

Try playing chess on an unusual round board. Test your logic, learn how to play in unusual conditions. A new board game for 2 players. Try playing chess on a round board, this is a new interesting game.

Rules of the game:

• The pawn goes 1 square ahead, beats obliquely;
• The horse walks as usual in chess;
• the elephant walks as usual in chess;
• the queen goes like an elephant and a king;
• The king walks by 1 cage in any direction.

The object of the game is to remove the enemy king.

This game develops logical thinking, allows you to learn to think in unusual conditions. The game is designed for children and adults. Playing chess on a round board will diversify your leisure time.
